items.summary: Update the AdminGuard component to allow admin access exclusively to the email address finproledge@gmail.com. Any authenticated user whose profile email does not exactly match finproledge@gmail.com must be shown an 'Access Denied' state and prevented from viewing any admin-only pages or content.

Ensure the backend isCallerAdmin authorization logic recognizes only the principal associated with the Internet Identity linked to finproledge@gmail.com as an admin. All admin-gated backend methods must reject calls from any other principal.
